summary:
The Boeing 767 is a large passenger airplane made by Boeing. It first flew in 1981 and was ready for passengers in 1982. The 767 is known for its two engines and wide body. It can fly long distances and carry many people, with different versions seating between 216 and 269 passengers.

This plane has been used by many airlines, with Delta Air Lines having the most. Over 1,400 orders have been placed, and it has competed with other planes like the Airbus A300 and A330. The 767 was replaced by the newer 787 Dreamliner in 2011.
title: Boeing 767
